landingScreen.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Talent Discovery Journey
landingScreen.welcomeSubtitle: This isn't just a test. It's a journey for us to discover together the perfect role that aligns with your talents and values within the NhiLe Team ecosystem.
landingScreen.howItWorksSubtitle: A transparent process designed to help you shine.
landingScreen.howItWorks1Text: Spend 20-35 minutes answering situational questions to help us understand you better.
landingScreen.howItWorks2Text: Instantly see your key strengths and areas where you can grow.
landingScreen.howItWorks3Text: We will suggest the most suitable path, from vocational training and volunteering to a full-time position.
landingScreen.whyItMattersTitle: Build a Team with Shared Direction
landingScreen.whyItMattersSubtitle: We believe that alignment in values and attitude is more important than experience. Data shows this approach builds more cohesive and effective teams.
landingScreen.stat1Text: Candidates have a higher rate of alignment with our team's culture and core values.
landingScreen.stat2Text: Save interview time by focusing on individuals who are a true fit.
landingScreen.stat3Text: Individuals who align with our values tend to have superior work performance.
landingScreen.exploreSubtitle: No matter what stage you are at, there's always a place for you to belong and contribute.
landingScreen.volunteerText: Dedicate your time to meaningful activities, support disadvantaged children, and spread positive values to the community.
landingScreen.vocationalText: Equip yourself with essential skills in technology and AI to confidently change your life, open up career opportunities at NhiLe Holding, and contribute to society.
landingScreen.stat4Text: Build a positive work environment and minimize unnecessary conflicts.
